#summary Mine REST API Reference

= Key =

  * _iid_ = itemId, integer > 0
  * TID = tagId, integer > 0
  * _rid_ = relationId, integer > 0
  * _rvsn_ = relationVersion, integer > 0
  * _cid_ = commentId, integer > 0
  * _format_ = "xml" | "json"
  * _key_ = structure element name, eg: "relationName", camelcase, case-sensitive

= Item API =

  * Name: read-item-data
  * URL: `/api/item/_iid_`
  * HTTP Method: GET

  * Name: list-items
  * URL: `/api/item._format_`
  * HTTP Method: GET

  * Name: create-item
  * URL: `/api/item._format_`
  * HTTP Method: POST

  * Name: delete-item
  * URL: `/api/item/_iid_._format_`
  * HTTP Method: DELETE

  * Name: read-item
  * URL: `/api/item/_iid_._format_`
  * HTTP Method: GET

  * Name: update-item
  * URL: `/api/item/_iid_._format_`
  * HTTP Method: POST

  * Name: delete-item-key
  * URL: `/api/item/_iid_/_key_._format_`
  * HTTP Method: DELETE

  * Name: get-item-key
  * URL: `/api/item/_iid_/_key_._format_`
  * HTTP Method: GET
